title: Company Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lpkfont_4155.jpg)

I've tried [http://www.findafont.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224222/http:/www.findafont.com/ "http://www.findafont.com/") and couldn't get anywhere.

Thanks
author: jpramos

comments.content:
Can't find an exact match either.  
It could be a slanted & heavily modified **Ritafurey (Bold)** by Rian Hughes [1995]:  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/ritafurey/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224222/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/ritafurey/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/ritafurey/")  
Set text to "LaPaRkan" to see the similarities.  
(The rough bottom edges at |R|,|k|,|n| of your sample, is an extra indication this is modified and not a font as it is).
